meteringrange: 0 to 20 EV (3D color matrix or center-weighted metering) 2 to 20 EV (Spot metering at ISO 100 equivalent, f/1.4 lens at 20°C/68°F)
exposurebracketing: 2 to 5 frames in steps of 1/3, 1/2, 2/3, 1, 2, or 3 EV
includedlens: AF-S DX NIKKOR 18-140mm f/3.5-5.6G VR & AF-S DX NIKKOR 55-300mm f/4.5-5.6G ED VR
flashsyncspeed: Up to 1/250 sec. Synchronizes with shutter at 1/320 s or slower
imagefileformats: JPEG: JPEG-Baseline Compliant with fine (approx 1:4), Normal (approx 1:8) or Basic (approx 1:16) Compression NEF (RAW) + JPEG: Single Photograph Recorded in both NEF (RAW) and JPEG Formats NEF (RAW): Lossless compressed, compressed 12 or 14 bit
exposurecompensation: ±5 EV in increments of 1/3 or 1/2 EV
shutterspeedrange: 1/8000 to 30 sec. in steps of 1/3 or 1/2 EV
incameraimageediting: Color Balance Color Outline Color Sketch D-Lighting Edit Movie Filter Effects Fisheye Image Overlay Miniature Effect Monochrome NEF (RAW) Processing Perspective Control Quick Retouch Red-Eye Correction Resize Selective Color Side-by-Side Comparison Straighten Trim
shootingmodes: Aperture-Priority (A) Manual (M) Programmed auto with flexible program (P) Shutter-Priority Auto (S)
playbackfunctions: Auto Image Rotation Full-Frame and Thumbnail (4, 9, or 72 images or calendar) Highlights Histogram Display Image Comment Movie Playback Movie Slideshow Playback with Zoom Slideshow
autofocuspoints: 9, 21 or 51 point Dynamic-area AF Auto-area AF Single-point AF
shutterreleasemodes: Continuous low-speed [CL] mode; 1-6 frames per second Continuous high-speed [CH] mode; 6 frames per second Interval timer photography supported Mirror-up [Mup] mode Quiet Shutter Release Self-timer Mode Single-frame [S] mode
meteringmodes: Center-weighted: Weight of 75% given to 8 mm circle in center of frame Matrix: 3D color matrix metering II (type G and D lenses); color matrix metering II (other CPU lenses) Spot: Meters 3.5 mm circle (about 2.5% of frame) centered on selected focus point
flashexposurecompensation: -3 to +1 EV in increments of 1/3 or 1/2 EV
whitebalancemodes: Auto Choose color temperature (2500K–10000K) Cloudy Direct Sunlight Flash Fluorescent (7 types) Incandescent Preset Manual Shade
maximumburst: DX-format CH: Up to 6 frames per second CL: Up to 1-6 frames per second 1.3X Crop Mode CH: Up to 7 frames per second CL: Up to 1-6 frames per second
scenemodes: Autumn Colors Beach / Snow Blossom Candlelight Child Close-up Dusk / Dawn Food Landscape Night Landscape Night Portrait Party / Indoor Pet Portrait Portrait Sports Sunset
lenscompatibility: AF NIKKOR, including type G and D lenses (some restrictions apply to PC Micro-NIKKOR lenses) and DX lenses. AI-P NIKKOR lenses, and non-CPU AI lenses (exposure modes A and M only) Electronic rangefinder can be used with lenses that have a maximum aperture of f/5.6 or faster (the electronic rangefinder supports the center 1 focus point with lenses that have a maximum aperture of f/8 or faster). IX NIKKOR lenses, lenses for the F3AF, and non-AI lenses cannot be used.
includes: < valign="top">AF-S DX NIKKOR 18-140mm f/3.5-5.6G VR Lens, D7100 Camera Body, AF-S DX NIKKOR 55-300mm f/4.5-5.6G ED VR Lens, EN-EL15 Rechargeable Li-ion Battery, MH-25 Quick Charger, UC-E17 USB Cable, AN-DC1 Camera Strap, Advanced Amateur Bag, 32GB SD Card, Better Pictures in 5 Minutes DVD,
facedetection: Face-Priority AF available in Live View only and D-Movie only
computerinterface: Accessory Terminal: Remote Cord: MC-DC2 (available separately); GPS unit: GP-1 (available separately) HDMI output: Type C mini-pin HDMI connector Hi-speed USB Stereo Microphone Input WR-1 and WR-R10 wireless remote controller (available separately)
remotecontroloption: WR-1 and WR-R10 wireless remote controller (available separately)
flashmodes: Auto Auto FP High-Speed Sync supported Auto with red-eye reduction Auto slow sync Auto slow sync with red-eye reduction Fill-flash Front-curtain sync (normal) Rear-curtain sync Red-Eye reduction Red-Eye reduction with slow sync Slow sync
audio: Built-in microphone, stereo External stereo microphone (optional) Microphone sensitivity can be adjusted
